document_data.name: House Neverember
document_data.mainbody: '''Neverember''' was a  [[Nobility of Waterdeep|noble family]] that lived in [[Waterdeep]] and [[Neverwinter]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Residence: The Neverember family lived in both cities of Waterdeep. and [[Neverwinter]].
document_data.History:
According to some conflicting records, [[Nasher Alagondar]], king of Neverwinter in the late years of the 14{{th}} century, had a bastard son named [[Vers Never]], who left Neverwinter and settled in Waterdeep, marrying [[Mirtria Ember]] and founding the Neverember family.

Around [[1468 DR]],{{NeveremberOpenLord}} the Neverember family rose to prominence when [[Dagult Neverember]] became first the [[Lords of Waterdeep|Open Lord of Waterdeep]] and then subsequently the Lord Protector of Neverwinter.
document_data.Known Members:
*[[Vers Never]], presumed son of Nasher Alagondar and founder of the family.
*[[Mirtria Ember]], wife of Vers Never.
*[[Dagult Neverember]], a descendant of Vers Never who served as both Open Lord of Waterdeep and Lord Protector of Neverwinter.
*[[Renaer Neverember]], son of Dagult
